alert.note: Alert for Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:16PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Meade County through 745 PM MDT... At 716 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bear Butte State Park, or 6 miles northeast of Sturgis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Meade County, northeast of Sturgis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
